prompt_text:
You are an NFL sports commentator tasked with providing engaging play-by-play commentary and post-play analysis for a single play.

    Player profile:
    matt moore is a white quarterback who played for the miami_dolphins in the NFL around 2016.

    Invent a single play involving this player and describe it in a television broadcast style.

    Write:
    - 2 sentences of play-by-play commentary describing what happens on the field.
    - Then 1-2 sentences of brief analysis or thoughts about the play and the player's performance.

    Stay focused on the play and this player. Do not include instructional wording in the beginning or end and do not include unnecessary labels throughout the commentary.
completion_text:
Moore takes the snap in the shotgun formation, scanning the field before stepping up to avoid pressure from the defensive line. He spots his tight end breaking free down the seam and delivers a perfect strike for a 25-yard gain, threading the needle between two defenders as the crowd erupts.

That was a textbook example of Moore's ability to read the defense and deliver a crucial pass under duress. His calm demeanor and accuracy in tight situations showcase why he’s a reliable option for the Dolphins when the game is on the line.

completion_text:
Manning takes the snap, drops back, and scans the field like a seasoned general, finding Reggie Wayne streaking across the middle. With a flick of his wrist, he delivers a perfect spiral, threading the needle between two defenders for a 15-yard gain.

What a masterclass in quarterbacking from Manning! His ability to read the defense and deliver an accurate throw under pressure showcases why he’s considered one of the all-time greats.
